name: @jakobwesthoff/dependency.js
description: A dependency injection container for javascript using explicit service definitions

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run babel:index && npm run babel:library && semantic-release pre
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run babel:index && npm run babel:library && npm run babel:specs && cd Distribution && ../node_modules/.bin/jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=Specification/Support/jasmine.json; cd ..

author: Jakob Westhoff <jakob@westhoffswelt.de> (http://westhoffswelt.de)
